name: Lights Out (itch) (SmoothAzz)
description:
Hi there!
Welcome to Lights out a game which is still in development but is one which is meant to represent E waste. The main character having Nyctophobia is scared of the dark but being tight on money she must take the risk to turn off everything around her house to reduce that electricity cost. Use the lights around the house strategically, to move around the apartment complex but watch out for your tolerance! the moment you enter the darkness the bar goes down periodically until it hits 0.

Possible Addition
  • All the voice acting lines 
  • More objects to turn off and on
  • extra room to the house or extension
  • Possibly a male character that you would be able to choose before starting the game?

Character Designer - @jeevanasara

Known bugs:
  • The door opening sometimes doesn't send the player to the area required
  • The tolerance meter is sometimes taken away even though in lighted area/ it is hard to tell what exactly the player can walk on
  • Interaction can overlap upon each other as in you can bug the interaction for the dialogue to permanently be on screen
  • The note which appears on the credits isn't as visible so as of right now the note will be worked on to be more visible.
  • Extras menu has a visual bug when switching between selection.
  • Visual bug on the WEBGL version will be worked on at a later date
